original_title: The Art of Thug Pimpin': Chapter 1
overview: Fillmoe Slim headlines this straight-from-the-streets program that reveals the straight facts about thug pimpin'. Get the lowdown from Gangsta Brown, Kenny Red, Mac Squeeze and other old-school O.G.'s, then hear about new tricks of the trade from next-generation thug pimps K.P., J. Sweet, Young Spyder, J/Rich, Willie Hen, Dru Down and J. Colone. From bare essentials to fine-tuned techniques, these boys share their secrets.
title: The Art of Thug Pimpin': Chapter 1
